nl.tue.geometrycore.geometry

Interface InfiniteGeometry<TClip extends BaseGeometry<TClip>>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HalfLine, Line

    public interface InfiniteGeometry<TClip extends BaseGeometry<TClip>>
    Interface that must be implemented by geometries that have an infinite span.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TClip clip(Rectangle clipbox)
      Clips the infinite geometry to the part that lies strictly within the clipbox.

    • Method Detail

      • clip

        TClip clip(Rectangle clipbox)
        Clips the infinite geometry to the part that lies strictly within the clipbox. Degeneracies (e.g. the parts coinciding with or touching the boundary), need not be returned. A null result indicates that the geometry has no part strictly within the clipbox.
        Parameters:
        clipbox -
        Returns:
